nodes.text: A skirmish above Raydonia was a short duel above the planet Raydonia during the Clone Wars. Obi-Wan Kenobi had been captured by the renegade Sith Lord Maul and Savage Opress after responding to the massacre they committed on the planet, but was rescued by Opress's former master, Asajj Ventress. After engaging the Nightbrothers in combat, Ventress and Kenobi fled using the escape pod.
